resources.string:
Original application by Jeffrey Blattman
Modified by Alexandros Schillings

 Uses icons from the Gnome Human-O2 skin and the Maliae skin.

v 1.1.4\n UI: Added icons, added more information in the filelist, folders will now always appear at the top, files and folders are alpha-sorted, added infobar in modelviewer.\n General: Refactored code, added intent filters for obj/off files (i.e. you can open them from a compatible file explorer), the app now also looks in the Downloads directory of the sd card for model files.
